<!-- source-hash: 086540e301c39454ea71bfa84b50b57e -->
A data transfer object that represents a paginated response containing audit log events, designed for external API consumption.

## Key Components

- **LogsResponse** - Main response class annotated with Swagger schema documentation
- **logs** - List of `LogResponse` objects containing the actual log events
- **pageInfo** - `PageInfo` object providing pagination metadata (total count, current page, etc.)
- **Lombok annotations** - `@Data`, `@Builder`, `@NoArgsConstructor`, `@AllArgsConstructor` for boilerplate code generation

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a logs response
LogsResponse response = LogsResponse.builder()
    .logs(Arrays.asList(
        LogResponse.builder().action("LOGIN").userId("user123").build(),
        LogResponse.builder().action("LOGOUT").userId("user123").build()
    ))
    .pageInfo(PageInfo.builder()
        .totalElements(150)
        .currentPage(1)
        .pageSize(20)
        .build())
    .build();

// In a REST controller
@GetMapping("/api/audit/logs")
public LogsResponse getAuditLogs(@RequestParam int page, @RequestParam int size) {
    return auditService.getPaginatedLogs(page, size);
}
```

The class is typically used in REST APIs to return structured audit log data with proper pagination support.
